member.summary: 原始文件类型(SPC, OPUS, DX, SPA, MAT...)

member.summary: 光谱类型（近红外、中红外、拉曼...)

member.name: P:ACloudFileFormat.FileFormat.FileInfo.fspare
member.summary: 光谱处理参数（主要用于Raman Shift系数）

member.name: F:ACloudFileFormat.FileFormat.DataInfo.dataType
member.summary: 数据类型(吸收谱, 干涉图...)

member.name: M:ACloudFileFormat.FileFormat.AcquisitionInfo.FromSPCLogData(System.String)
member.summary: 从SPC 注释中读取采集参数

member.name: P:ACloudFileFormat.FileFormat.AcquisitionInfo.SCANSBG
member.summary: Number of co-added scans in background file

member.name: P:ACloudFileFormat.FileFormat.AcquisitionInfo.IRMODE
member.summary: FTIR Laser Sampling Frequency and Raman Mode 2 = Mid-IR mode 1 = Near-IR mode -2 = Raman-shift

member.name: P:ACloudFileFormat.FileFormat.AcquisitionInfo.APOD
member.summary: Apodization function type name， "None" (boxcar apodization) "Triangular" "Weak" Norton-Beer "Medium" Norton-Beer "Strong" Norton-Beer "Happ-Genzel" "Bessel" "Cosine" "Filler" "Kaiser" Bessel "Gaussian" "Tradezoidal"

member.name: P:ACloudFileFormat.FileFormat.AcquisitionInfo.PHASEPTS
member.summary: Number of interferogram points used for phase correction

member.name: P:ACloudFileFormat.FileFormat.AcquisitionInfo.IGRAMSIDE
member.summary: nterferogram mode name: "Double" sided "Single" sided "Left" single sided "Right" single sided

member.name: P:ACloudFileFormat.FileFormat.AcquisitionInfo.IGRAMDIR
member.summary: Interferogram collection direction name: "Bi" interferometer scans in both direction "Uni" interferometer scans in one direction "Forward" uni-directional "Reverse" uni-directional

member.name: P:ACloudFileFormat.FileFormat.AcquisitionInfo.SMOOTH
member.summary: Number of averaged readings per data point

member.name: P:ACloudFileFormat.FileFormat.AcquisitionInfo.BEAM
member.summary: Single beam mode name: "Sample" (Does not replace existing background). “Background" for future ratioing with sample.

member.name: P:ACloudFileFormat.FileFormat.AcquisitionInfo.AVGTIME
member.summary: Time for A/D averaging of each point reading (msec). If the A/D has a fixed time and point readings are averaged, then this time should be divided by the approximate A/D time to get the number of readings.

member.name: P:ACloudFileFormat.FileFormat.AcquisitionInfo.CHANNEL
member.summary: Detector or beam path channel used for acquisition

member.name: T:ACloudFileFormat.FileFormat.SPECTYPE
member.summary: fexper 光谱类型(红外，近红外，拉曼...)

member.name: F:ACloudFileFormat.FileFormat.SPECTYPE.SPCFTIR
member.summary: 傅立叶变换中红外，近红外，拉曼FT-IR, FT-NIR, FT-Raman
